description: This header file declares API functions for the Slap Module Container Object in the Service Logic Aggregation Plane (SLAP). It includes function prototypes for creating, removing, enrolling objects, and initializing the module container, serving as an interface for external modules or components to interact with SLAP's container object.

methods.name: SlapCreateModuleContainer
methods.description: Creates a new module container object with specified context handles.

methods.name: SlapMcoCreate
methods.description: Creates the Slap Module Container object with given context handles.

methods.name: SlapMcoRemove
methods.description: Removes the specified Slap Module Container object.

methods.name: SlapMcoEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls or registers objects within the Slap Module Container.

methods.name: SlapMcoInitialize
methods.description: Initializes the Slap Module Container object.
